page.title: 13OUR VILLAGE BOBBY
page.content: Has been a village policeman in Brandon since 1961 when he came from South Yorkshire. His favourite part of the village is where it is quiet and he has an allotment. He has been saddened by the pit closures, the disappearance of the railway and has seen many new housing estates grow up. When he is on duty he reports to Meadowfield Police Station which is linked to his main office in Durham. Any reports that come in are given to him and he investigates. He likes the people of Brandon and is well known to nearly everybody.He likes to help people and has had some frightening moments with drunks. Usually nothing out of the ordinary occurs in Brandon but this year he has investigated an abandoned baby and a murder on the old raiway line.
